description: Try our easy to follow Roast Tomatoes With Garlic, Thyme & Balsamic recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Tomatoes With Garlic, Thyme & Balsamic
name: Roast Tomatoes With Garlic, Thyme & Balsamic Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 50 minutes or until very soft and caramelised. Squeeze garlic from bulb halves and serve with tomatoes.
